summary: The module implements a core audio manipulation class that represents immutable chunks of sound, supporting indexing by time, slicing, concatenation, volume scaling, fading, channel and sample‑rate conversion, overlaying, reversing, and exporting to various file formats. It also provides utility descriptors and helper functions for handling WAV headers and audio I/O.
business_intent: Enable the application to load, edit, combine, and export audio data programmatically, offering a high‑level interface for audio processing tasks within the larger system.
